languages.text: {n}Хоть Тассерианцы и верят в Бога-Императора, их толкование Кредо граничит с ересью. Служение Ему уже награда, и только желание служить дольше и усерднее достойно стремления.{/n}

{n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хоть Тассерианцы и верят в Бога-Императора, их толкование Кредо граничит с ересью. Служение Ему уже награда, и только желание служить дольше и усерднее достойно стремления.{/n}

{n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}タッセーラ人は皇帝神を敬ってはいるが、その教義の解釈は異端すれすれだ。皇帝神に仕えること自体がすでに報いで、追う価値があるのは、より長く、より熱心に仕えたいという欲だけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}タッサリア人は皇帝神を敬ってはいるが、その教義の解釈は異端すれすれだ。皇帝神に仕えること自体がすでに報いで、追う価値があるのは、より長く、より熱心に仕えたいという欲だけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aunque los thasserianos veneran al Dios Emperador, su interpretación del Credo raya en la herejía. Servirle es en sí mismo una recompensa, y el afán de hacerlo durante más tiempo y con mayor ahínco es lo único digno de encomio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque los thasserianos veneran al Dios Emperador, su interpretación del Credo raya en la herejía. Servirle es en sí mismo una recompensa, y el afán de hacerlo durante más tiempo y con mayor ahínco es lo único digno de encomio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管塔瑟拉人尊崇神皇信仰，但他们对信仰的解释几乎可以算得上是异端邪说。能够服侍神皇，这件事情本身就是祂对人类的恩赐，而人类唯一该渴求的，就是如何更加长久、更加虔敬地服侍祂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管塔瑟拉人尊崇神皇信仰，但他们对信仰的解释几乎可以算得上是异端邪说。能够服侍神皇，这件事情本身就是祂对人类的恩赐，而人类唯一该渴求的，就是如何更加长久、更加虔敬地服侍祂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Obwohl die Thesserianer den Gottimperator ehren, grenzt ihre Interpretation des Glaubens an Ketzerei. Ihm zu dienen, ist bereits Lohn genug, und allein das Ziel, Ihm länger und mit noch größerem Eifer zu dienen, ist würdig, verfolgt zu werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Obwohl die Thesserianer den Gottimperator ehren, grenzt ihre Interpretation des Glaubens an Ketzerei. Ihm zu dienen, ist bereits Lohn genug, und allein das Ziel, Ihm länger und mit noch größerem Eifer zu dienen, ist würdig, verfolgt zu werden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si les Thasseriens honorent l'Empereur-Dieu, leur interprétation du crédo est à la limite de l'hérésie. La véritable récompense, c'est d'être à Son service, et un seul désir mérite d'être poursuivi : celui de prolonger cet engagement avec dévotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si les Thasseriens honorent l'Empereur-Dieu, leur interprétation du crédo est à la limite de l'hérésie. La véritable récompense, c'est d'être à Son service, et un seul désir mérite d'être poursuivi : celui de prolonger cet engagement avec dévotion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Thasseralılar Tanrı İmparator'u onurlandırsa da İtikat'a dair yorumları, kâfirlik sınırında geziniyor. O'na hizmet zaten başlı başına bir ödülken bunu daha uzun süre ve daha büyük bir şevkle gerçekleştirme arzusu, uğruna çabalamaya değerdir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though the Thasserians honour the God-Emperor, their interpretation of the Creed verges on heresy. Serving Him is already the reward, and only the desire to serve longer and with greater zeal is worthy of pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Thasseralılar Tanrı İmparator'u onurlandırsa da İtikat'a dair yorumları, kâfirlik sınırında geziniyor. O'na hizmet zaten başlı başına bir ödülken bunu daha uzun süre ve daha büyük bir şevkle gerçekleştirme arzusu, uğruna çabalamaya değerdir.{/n}
